name: Onchain Trade Protocol
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

description.en:
An onchain money market & a perps DEX with up to 50x leverage. Key features:
1. OT allows single token liquidity provision
2. OT allows borrow as well as spot exchange
3. OT introduces a native stable coin called OSD(One Stable Dollar)
4. OT allows 0 slip onchain perpetual swap
5. OT share revenue to token holders
6. OT liquidity providers earn swap fees, borrow fees as well as perps trading fees, in comparison with other mainstream DeFi protocols such as Uniswap, Curve or AAVE, on which liquidity providers only have one source of yield.
